snippet: Marc-Edouard Vlasic scored with 2.9 seconds remaining to give the San Jose Sharks a 3-2 win over the host Winnipeg Jets.
abstract: San Jose Sharks defeat Winnipeg Jets, 3-2.
lead_paragraph: Marc-Edouard Vlasic scored with 2.9 seconds remaining to give the San Jose Sharks a 3-2 win over the host Winnipeg Jets.

headline.main: Sharks Win With a Late Goal
headline.print_headline: Sharks Win With a Late Goal
